adverbs.description: ideally (comparative more ideally, superlative most ideally)

entries.meaning: In an ideal way; perfectly. [from 18th c.]
examples: The summit of Mauna Kea is considered the ideal place to mount an astronomical observatory, for above the clouds there is only the stars and the skies are ideally transparent.
Ideally, we would have one textbook per student, but unfortunately some of you will have to share.
